description:
Linux Mint lead developer Clement Lefebvre published a new monthly newsletter where he shares more details about some of the major changes coming to the next Linux Mint 22 release related to Thunderbird, PipeWire, and other components.

The post Linux Mint Devs to Ship Thunderbird as a DEB Package in Linux Mint 22 appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Linux Mint Devs to Ship Thunderbird as a DEB Package in Linux Mint 22

description:
Samba, the popular open-source software suite that provides file, print, and authentication services for SMB/CIFS networks, has announced the release of Samba 4.20.0. This release comes after six months of development and includes several new features and improvements, particularly in the areas of Active Directory (AD) compatibility and new utilities.

The post Samba 4.20 Released: Enhancements for Seamless Integration appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Samba 4.20 Released: Enhancements for Seamless Integration

description:
Flowblade 2.14’s highlights include a USB shuttle feature, advanced title editing, slowmo playback, and more.

The post Flowblade 2.14 Multitrack Non-linear Video Editor Released appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Flowblade 2.14 Multitrack Non-linear Video Editor Released
